00039 MetadataNormal::MetadataNormal(const TableIdentifier *identifier,
00040                                const String &end_row)
00041   : m_files_scanner_ptr(0) {
00042   m_metadata_key = String("") + (uint32_t)identifier->id + ":" + end_row;
00043 }

00050 MetadataNormal::~MetadataNormal() {
00051   m_files_scanner_ptr = 0;

00056 void MetadataNormal::reset_files_scan() {
00057   ScanSpec scan_spec;
00058   RowInterval ri;
00059 
00060   scan_spec.row_limit = 1;
00061   scan_spec.max_versions = 1;
00062   ri.start = m_metadata_key.c_str();
00063   ri.end   = m_metadata_key.c_str();
00064   scan_spec.row_intervals.push_back(ri);
00065   scan_spec.columns.clear();
00066   scan_spec.columns.push_back("Files");
00067 
00068   m_files_scanner_ptr = Global::metadata_table_ptr->create_scanner(scan_spec);
00069 }
00070 
00071 
00072 
00073 bool MetadataNormal::get_next_files(String &ag_name, String &files) {
00074   Cell cell;
00075 
00076   assert(m_files_scanner_ptr);
00077 
00078   if (m_files_scanner_ptr->next(cell)) {
00079     assert(!strcmp(cell.column_family, "Files"));
00080     ag_name = String(cell.column_qualifier);
00081     files = String((const char *)cell.value, cell.value_len);
00082     return true;
00083   }
00084 
00085   m_files_scanner_ptr = 0;
00086   return false;
00087 }
00088

00090 
00091 void MetadataNormal::write_files(const String &ag_name, const String &files) {
00092   TableMutatorPtr mutator_ptr;
00093   KeySpec key;
00094 
00095   mutator_ptr = Global::metadata_table_ptr->create_mutator();
00096 
00097   key.row = m_metadata_key.c_str();
00098   key.row_len = m_metadata_key.length();
00099   key.column_family = "Files";
00100   key.column_qualifier = ag_name.c_str();
00101   key.column_qualifier_len = ag_name.length();
00102   mutator_ptr->set(key, (uint8_t *)files.c_str(), files.length());
00103   mutator_ptr->flush();
00104 }
